title: ★ NEWLY RENOVATED ★ Somerville 4 Bdrm ★ Close to Harvard
posting_body: A short walk to Harvard and Lesley Universities.
It has a modern, bright 2 story living space.
White kitchen cabinets with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances.
This 1200 sq ft house have 4 bedrooms and 1.5 baths.
LANDLORD IS PAYING 50% OF THE BROKERS FEE!

Bus: 77 Massachusetts Ave @ Exeter Park (0.37 mi)

Bus: 85 Summer St opp Carter Terr (0.45 mi)
